title: Welcome to my blog!
text: My name is Layla, and my posts feature explorations of LLMs and reflections on the book Unmasking AI by Dr. Buolamwini.

title: My Explorations with LLMs
text:
Visual Comparison of Bias in Image Generation (Professional Roles)



Image Generation

Bias

Ethics



This blog post series will feature a visual comparison of bias in AI image generators assumed to rely on Dall-E 3 or a close variant of it, in order to visually explore how systems built around a model may impact bias in output. This post features prompts related to professions.





Sep 18, 2025

title: Visual Comparison of Bias in Image Generation (Professional Roles)
text:
This blog post series will explore bias between various models’ image generation. In this second post, I will visually compare the models’ responses to two prompts involving roles in a professional context.
All generated images are visually similar, with five out of the six images featuring the subject and object of the prompt as a (typically older) white male. The exception is Dall-E Free’s “doctor treating a patient” image, in which the doctor is again a white male, but in which the patient has no identifying features visible. Dall-E Free’s images again appear more stylized, but for the most part, it seems clear that the platforms are indistinguishable with respect to bias.



bias-profession.png
